item.description:
Edie TSF BEGINNER BOOTCAMP!

LEARN TO SALSA IN JUST 1 DAY!

IN BOSTON!

Saturday, January 12th, 2008!

Edie the Salsa Freak's World Famous

Men and Women All-Day
"BEGINNER" Bootcamp!!

No partner necessary!
Grrrrreat way to meet new people!
Free Breakfast & Lunch!!

Pay in Advance and Save $30!

LAST DAY TO SIGN UP ONLINE IS JANUARY 10TH!

LEARN TO DANCE
SALSA IN ONE DAY!!!

Eight Hours of Beginning Salsa for:

the Absolute Novice Beginner that doesn't
know a thing about dancing!

ALL FOR AN UNBELIEVABLE DEAL OF
ONLY $65 IN ADVANCE! ($95 at door)

STUDENT DISCOUNT OF ONLY $50 IN ADVANCE!

Free Breakfast Munchies and Lunch Included!

Invite those friends who always wanted to learn! Your family who keep saying they want to do it! This is the time to start!

Brought to you by Masacote Entertainment, the Boston/Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group, and Metamovements!

More Info & Schedule:
http://www.masacoteen...
item.why: Meet People! Learn salsa in a day! Set out on those New Years Resolutions to try something new in life!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: BEGINNER SALSA BOOTCAMP! Learn Salsa in 1 Day!
